update need set start_type_ = #{startType,jdbcType=CHAR}, TYPE_ = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_ID_ = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description_ = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME_ = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME_ = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME_ = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ENABLE_ = #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR}, EVALUATE = #{evaluate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESPONDER_ = #{responder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENT_ = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from need
and where_ like concat('%', (concat(#{where}, '%')))
and type_ like concat('%', (concat(#{type}, '%')))
order by CREATE_TIME_ desc
